item.description:
We are going to attend the Blues and Brews Fest.

Live Music-TOP BLUES BANDS
Dozens of regional craft breweries, PLUS a special booth featuring cask conditioned ale
Great BBQ food
Homebrew competition awards
Collectible quality program book featuring bands and breweries
Raffles, games, homebrew demonstrations, craft & vendor booths, more!
Regular admission includes ten beer tasting, or equivalent in non-alcoholic beverages (for those not of legal drinking age). Kids under 12 are free and must be accompanied by an adult.

PLEASE NOTE:
No Pets
No Coolers
No Readmission

http://www.bluesnbrew...

Bands:
http://www.bluesnbrew...

Cost:
$28 - EARLY BIRD TICKETS (before July 25)
$30 - REGULAR ADVANCE TICKETS (July 26-Aug 19)
$35 - GENERAL ADMISSION at Gate (while supplies last)
$95 - VIP TICKET PACKAGE

http://www.skinashoba...

Directions:
Boston or RT. 95/128: Take Rt. 2 West to Concord Circle, then West on Rt. 2A/119 about 6 miles to Powers Road (on your right)

North of Boston: Take Rt. 495 South to Exit 32 (Westford), left off exit, first right on to Rt. 110 to Powers Road (1 mile on your left).

North Shore: Take Rt. 128 South to Rt. 3 North to Rt. 495 South, Exit 32.

South of Boston: Take Rt. 495 North to Exit 31 (Littleton Common), then East on Rt. 2A/119 about 2 miles to Powers Road (on your left).

Buy Your Tickets Here:
http://www.skinashoba...

Carpooling from Nashua:
We will leave the Exit 6 off of Route 3, Welcome Center parking lot at 12:30.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign.
item.name: Blues and Brews Festival
